amendment.description: An amendment numbered 109 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funding for rule titled "Control of Air Pollution From New Motor Vehicles: Heavy- Duty Engine and Vehicle Standards.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.
